thread.section_title: GoDaddy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDaddy | www.godaddy.com
thread.title: Francesco Malatesta

author: Francesco Malatesta
title: Francesco Malatesta
text:
I had 3 .co.uk domain that were set-up for renewal on the 11/03/2017.
On the 27th of Feb 2017 (2 weeks before renewal date) Go Daddy charged my card, well before the renewal date. An obvious mistake.
I spoke 3 times to Go Daddy and their terrible customer service. They are not acknowledging their mistake and will NOT refund. They say they can not refund because .co.uk are not refundable. (Whatever that means). They are expecting me to pay for their mistake. Unbelievable.
I had to call my bank to open a dispute case and go from there.
Beware!
